Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger

Class LogBuilderCore

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger.LogBuilderCore
public class LogBuilderCore extends Object
Fluent API builder for logging messages with advanced options.
